name: Dream Team Agency - Galactic Cruise
description:
Story and Goal

We are the DreamTeam Agency a spatial agency specialized in inter-planet travel.
Our mission is to satisfy the consumer and try to make its request possible.
So your goal is to make the most interesting itinerary as possible in a given time and to satisfy the client. We need also to follow the itinerary given and the request of ours consumers.

Controls

Right click to cancel
Left click to select

Tools

- Unity 2020.3.3
- Maya
- Photoshop
- Substance Painter
- Z brush

Context

It's a Game-Jam video realized in 48 hours during the Game-Jam GKT2021.

Credits

- Yvan Bladet : Dev, Level designer, Game designer
- Sidney Deschamps :  3D Artist, Ui designer
- Anaïs Lafond :  2D Artist, Ui designer, Concept artist
- Mathieu Belzo : Artistic director, Artist 3D
